name: Sociable
body:
![](https://github.com/relisher/eMerge/blob/master/app/src/main/res/drawable/logo.png?raw=true)

The app that connects you.

This app allows you to connect with people around the world simply with a Facebook account and an image of your friend.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
